channel.title: How to get people to connect to my server
channel.description: i portforwarded my router, i have no-ip running, i have the run-server running, i jarred the client but people get this error "could not find the main class: client. Program will exit." can anyone help? if i am doing something wrong please tell me how to properly get servers online.

item.title: How to get people to connect to my server

how do you do that?
